tweet: Thanks for working to share these updates and guidance with your constituents. Together, we will stop the spread of COVID-19 and keep Georgia families safe! #gapol

name: Brian Kemp
tweet: We are working around the clock w/ the Trump Admin, state partners, & local leaders to reduce the spread of COVID-19 & prepare for all possible scenarios. We are in this fight together & will continue to put the health & safety of Georgians first.  https://t.co/LtiFktXyDK #gapol
